Stunned

Source: XPHB, page 376

While you have the Stunned condition, you experience the following effects. You have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws.Attack|XPHB rolls against you have Advantage|XPHB.
